item.title: Torrent Power Ltd. Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 11 Feb 2026
item.description: Torrent Power Ltd. experienced a notable intraday decline on 11 Feb 2026, touching a low of Rs 1,398.8, reflecting a 5.7% drop from previous levels. This downturn occurred amid broader market pressures and a reversal following a week-long rally, signalling immediate selling interest and subdued sentiment within the power sector. Time: 11 minutes ago
